text_block_list.name: Live Commentary
text_block_list.text:
200m left!! Hishi Amazon is leading the way! Narita Brian has a 
hard time catching up!

After the “Emperor Prize (Autumn)”, she 
was also defeated in the “Japan Cup”ー

I looked back again and again at the race video 
to find out what caused Narita Brian, who continued 
to win so much, to go on a losing streak.

If we go with the current rotation, the next is “Arima Kinen”. I 
wonder if there is a hint of that strength coming back somewhere…

text_block_list.name: Live Commentary
text_block_list.text:
Hishi Amazon, reaches the goal with slightly 2 lengths! Narita 
Brian is further behind, passing the goal board in 6th position!

After all, the feeling is not out yet. Her form with a lower 
center of gravity like beforeー

After all, the feeling is not out yet. Her form with a lower 
center of gravity like beforeー
(Knock-Knock)

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Excuse me for interrupting so suddenly, I'm coming in.
It's unusual, you're coming to visit me.
It's unusual, you're coming to visit me.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, I have something to talk about my 
sister who you are taking care of.

Although she spoke the words she used to say, her 
expressions were serious. Now, she must be the one 
who cares about Narita Brian the most.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
In the world it seems there is talk which refers to “I wonder if 
she's injured or not cured”…

That's just what they say. Even when I look at the footage, 
Brian's injury is definitely healed.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
I thought so, it's hard to believe you're forcing Brian to do 
this. However, it is also true that no results are coming out.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
In this situation, do you still intend to 
let Brian run in the “Arima Kinen”?
It's up to Brian if she wants to do it.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: However, you don't even know what caused this, right?

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
…If she loses in the same way in the “Arima Kinen”, 
the voice that questions your policy will get 
stronger, will you still let her run?

I'm sure that the reactions that Biwa Hayahide talked about will 
happen, but I don't care about thoseー
choice_data_list:
I'm just thinking about Brian's intentions 
as my number 1 priority

I'm just thinking about Brian's intentions 
as my number 1 priority

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Ehehe… I see, hearing you say that makes me relieved.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
To tell you the truth, I came here today to ask you to let Brian 
run in the “Arima Kinen”.
Pardon…?

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
But, it seems that there was no need for that. Your Horse Girl… 
You think about Brian as your first priority.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
I have something to tell you. About the time she lost in the 
“Emperor Prize (Autumn)”.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
I myself was not expecting her to lose to 12th place. So I went 
to talk to her after the race…
Brian was crying…?

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
I've been her sister for many years, but I don't know when was 
the last time I saw her crying.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: But she's not the kind of girl who can easily stop running.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Trainer, With your strength help my sister… Please.

Biwa Hayahide, You may already know 
what happened to Narita Brian.

Her eyes that said “Please my sister”, 
harbored such strong feelings.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Heh… heh…
It's time to stop using the course, Brian.
It's time to stop using the course, Brian.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
…The ”Arima Kinen” is just around the corner. I don't have the 
time to be leisurely around.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: So Trainer… Are you here to stop my training?
No, I came to see you.
No, I came to see you.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: …To see me?

I heard from Hayahide about the “Emperor 
Prize (Autumn)” after the race.
I don't know what your tears mean.
I don't know what your tears mean.

But, Um I understood that the “Emperor Prize 
(Autumn)” was a very big event for you.

But, Um I understood that the “Emperor Prize 
(Autumn)” was a very big event for you.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: …I see, that's why you came to see me.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
So what do we do? Are you saying you want 
to cancel the “Arima Kinen” race?

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
Are you saying such a pathetic Horse Girl who loses and tears up 
has no qualification to appear in the Grand Prix!
Narita Brian gazed at me with a clear vision.

It seemed that there was something faintly shining in her eyes. 
That's why, I was convinced.
choice_data_list: No, you will appear in the “Arima Kinen”
No, you will appear in the “Arima Kinen”

text_block_list.text:
It seemed that there was something faintly shining in her eyes. 
That's why, I was convinced.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: …Why, would you do that?

Because I understood the meaning of your tears a little. Your 
feelings will never change.

Because I understood the meaning of your tears a little. Your 
feelings will never change.

Then I said, I'll let you do as you like. I'm a trainer who 
supports Horse Girls.

Then I said, I'll let you do as you like. I'm a trainer who 
supports Horse Girls.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: …I see.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: I'm sorry, I said it in a blaming way. And then… Thank you.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Yeah, Let's challenge them with all our might!

I don't know why Narita Brian's condition was bad. And I don't 
know the true meaning behind the tears she shed.

But, I still believe in her. The strong 
feelings that were put into that gaze.

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text:
Narita Brian, enter the last straight line in the perfect 
condition! Now, will Narita Brian come back today!!?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: The positioning is perfect! From here at once!!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text:
The first is Mayano Top Gun, who won the “Kikkashou”!! Narita 
Brian is chasing desperately!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Go, Brian! Show me your run!!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text:
However, the growth is painful! Brian, can't that amazing leg 
come out here again!?

Before long, the expression of Narita Brian running in front of 
me jumped into my field of vision clearly.
Narita Brian is running desperately with her legs.

However, the shadow of Mayano Top Gun running in front is also 
stepped on, and is also exchanged by the opponent who has been 
chasing up from the rear.

text_block_list.name: Spectator A
text_block_list.text: It's not working, it's not growing!

text_block_list.name: Spectator B
text_block_list.text: After all, Brain the strongest is no longer…!

However, her eyes don't change. It is still that preaching gaze 
that holds the victory and only looks at the goal.

When I saw Narita Brian's desperate 
expression, I finally realized.

The reason she continued to lose was not because of the pain of 
her injury or lack of coordination. She can no longer do “That 
run” the same as before…

She realized that at the time of “Emperor Prize (Autumn)”, that's 
why she was in despair and shed tears.

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text:
Narita Brian, the difference can't be reduced! 
Mayano Top Gun is on her own!

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Haaaa～～!!!!

…But, she keeps running like this. Looking 
forward instead of looking back.
The moment I learned that, the words suddenly came to meー

text_block_list.name: Spectator A
text_block_list.text: …Eh!? You can do it～～!!!!

text_block_list.name: Spectator B
text_block_list.text: You can do it, Brian!! You can do it!!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text:
Mayano Top Gun, the first to cross the goal!! The winner of the 
“Kikkashou” also wins the “Arima Kinen”!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: Narita Brian finishes in 4th place!

It may have been the first time that I said “You can do it” to 
her who boasted overwhelming strength.
And yet as her trainer myself, I felt like I have moved forward.

Narita Brian just runs towards victory and continues. That's why 
she's definitely the strongest Horse Girl even now…!
